LanguageData.Destroyer_Psycho.label: psycho
LanguageData.Destroyer_Psycho.description: A small and quick semi-humanoid creature. It has spikes for arms and is deadly in melee combat.
LanguageData.Destroyer_Psycho.tools.left_spike.label: left spike
LanguageData.Destroyer_Psycho.tools.right_spike.label: right spike
